alert.note: Alert for Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 6:21AM EST until January 05 at 10:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Northwest Suffolk, Southwest Suffolk, Northern Nassau and Southern Nassau Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures have been slow to rise and showers moving into the area may result in freezing rain creating hazardous travel through the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk
